casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terrence Lowell HYMAN 245A08-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Nicholaos Vlahos, Assistant Attorney *521General, Valerie Mitchell Asbell, District Attorney, for State of NC. Nicholas C. Woomer-Deters, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hyman, Terrence Lowell.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of April 2017 by Defendant to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
